bug.author: TobyRoseman
bug.summary: Broken Links in Ubuntu 14.04 Install Instructions
bug.description:
The following URLs in our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/blob/master/LINUX_INSTALL.md#ubuntu--1404>LINUX_INSTALL.md</denchmark-link> are broken:
It's not clear how to get these packages now. Without these you can not use TuriCreate on Ubuntu 14.04
